reviewText:
I really enjoyed season 1 as the DVD was in region 1 (US) and had English subtitles, but I wouldn't have bought it had I known season 2 was in region 2 (not a deal breaker because you can change the region), and no English subtitles <- dealbreaker
What a shame.

Better than U.S. redo, "Humans," but producers did not wish to capture revenue from selling with English subtitles.  Small fiscal investment to add subs, but money not as important to producers as snub to English speakers.  I refuse to buy season #1 with English subtitles as cannot understand season #2 as no subs.  Can't fix stupid - they invested in one of two seasons with English.  Shameful, foolish, and disloyal to those who funded the show and actors therein.
